snippet: A three-judge panel in New York reversed a ruling that had held the Palestinian Authority and the Palestine Liberation Organization liable for supporting attacks in Israel that killed Americans....
abstract: Federal appeals court determines that Federal District Court in Manhattan did not have jurisdiction in 2015 civil case that held Palestinian Authority and Palestine Liberation Organization liable for supporting terrorist attacks that killed American citizens in Israel; reverses $655.5 million verdict.

byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: A three-judge panel in New York reversed a ruling that had held the Palestinian Authority and the Palestine Liberation Organization liable for supporting attacks in Israel that killed Americans.

headline.main: Court Throws Out $655.5 Million Terrorism Verdict Against Palestinian Groups
headline.print_headline: Court Throws Out $655.5 Million Verdict in Terror Case Against Palestinian Groups
